name: Key to Heaven (itch)
description:
Welcome to "Key to Heaven", my second gamedev project ever and also second participation to a Mini Jam.

Key to Heaven is, or at least strives to be, a story-centric exploration and puzzle game. Though the game is fonctionnal, I had very little time to add concrete content. You may see this version as a PoC.

Controls
  • Move with <A/D> or with directional arrows. People with AZERTY keyboards will probably have to change their keyboard settings to QWERTY, or use the arrows...
  • When you reach a zone where you can place a key down, hold down one of the key written above to fill the jauge and put it down. Different keys will have different behaviours.
  • When a grey box with choices is displayed, you can use your keyboard to enter the choice, then confirm with <Return> (or <Enter>). 
  • Whenever a lign of dialog is displayed, you can move to the next one with <Space>. At the en of the level, when your choice has been confirmed, hit <Space> to move to the next level.
Notes and thoughts

I am a one-person team, and only very recently picked up gave devlopment. Doing this project took me 30+ hours on the span of two days and a third (?). It was extremely ambitious to me, especially compared to my last game that was really small. I am very proud of what I did for this jam!

(By the way because there were a lot of comments on my last game about that... yeah there is no music. I didn't find the time to configure that, I really wanted to squeeze the last bit of content and draw some final sprites, and write some final dialogues. Hope you can forgive me for that!)

Thank you for playing Key to Heaven, and see you next time maybe for another game!
